spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script: Enable('VAR_R_MIN', Eq('VAR_RATE', '1'));\ Enable('VAR_R_MAX', Eq('VAR_RATE', '1'));\ Enable('PRUNE', Eq('CIC_TYPE', 'Decimation Filter'));\ Enable('URAM_MAXDEPTH', Eq('USE_RAM', '1'));\ Validate('Number of Interfaces cannot exceed Minimal Variable Rate specified', And(GtOrEq('VAR_R_MIN', 'IF_NUM'), Eq('VAR_RATE', '1')));\ Validate('Number of Interfaces cannot exceed Rate change value', And(Eq('VAR_RATE', '0'), GtOrEq('R_RATE', 'IF_NUM')));\ Validate('Number of channels = IF_NUM * CLK_PER_CHANNEL. CoreCIC does not support more than 64 channels', GtOrEq('64', Mul('IF_NUM', 'CLK_PER_SAMPLE')));\

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description: Cascaded Integrator-Comb multirate filter can be configured to decimate or interpolate input signal. The core supports fixed or programmable rate change from 2 to 1024, one to eight integrator-comb stages. Time shared hardware is used to implement up to 64 data channels at minimal resource utilization. Input and output data widths are configurable as well, as a choice of Hogenauer pruning and output rounding techniques. Differential comb delay values of one and two are implemented
